text: Bob Penberthy is a former rugby union player who set the record for appearances (with 877) for Pontypridd RFC between 1961 and 1985. He was known as the Bionic Elbow. https://www.walesonline.co.uk/sport/other-sport/rugby- legends-gather-honour-pontypridd-2132556 ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Pontypridd RFC players
title: Bob Penberthy
